!High Priest Squillari: Welcome, traveler. May the goddess of light's providence be always with you. I am Squillari, a servant of Einhasad, who lives to help fulfill the will of the goddess of light in this land of water. Traveler, it would be a blessing if I could help you in your search for instruction.
